	Hi @'Lali Das' <mailto:Lali.Das@chalhoub.com>  

	 

	I tried reaching you by phone earlier but was unable to connect.

	 

	Please note that the gate pass application has been approved for tomorrow , as attached. The next step will be to issue the gate pass upon the crew’s arrival at the community with the goods.

	 

	@'Geeta Manjal' <mailto:Geeta.Manjal@chalhoub.com>  — Kindly be advised that Baxter cannot be held responsible for any customs clearance delays. Our crew will be on standby awaiting receipt of the shipment. Once received, they will proceed to Nakheel Security to obtain the gate pass, which, as we’re all aware, often involves "long queues and processing challenges". Your support in facilitating this process from your side would be highly appreciated to avoid any last-minute issues.

	 

	As the shipment arrived yesterday (Delayed by one day) and the ADM booking is confirmed for tomorrow at morning hours, we anticipate release by approximately 8:00 to 9:00 AM (Estimated only). If all goes smoothly, with no clearance delays, traffic conditions or Nakheel Security—estimated delivery is between 11:00 AM and 12:00 PM.

	Hi @Kiran Anwar <mailto:kiran@baxtershipping.com>  / @'Benson Davis' <mailto:ben@baxtershipping.com> 

	Good afternoon, 

	 

	Please arrange the Gatepass from your end and ensure both attached NOCs are uploaded on the Nakheel website during the application. The Gatepass should be requested with the maximum validity.

	Kindly update us once the Delivery Order and Bill of Entry are ready, and share the delivery plan accordingly.

	Before scheduling the delivery, please confirm the Gatepass is valid ( share a screenshot of Gatepass approval ) and keep us informed of its status.

	Ensure the following details are included when submitting the approval request on the website.

	 

	- https://onlineservices.nakheel.com <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/QjQGCBRk0iv0VzQtEfBi2GXNf?domain=urlsand.esvalabs.com> 

	 

	- License Plate

	- ⁠Driving License

	- ⁠Truck Plate Number

	- ⁠Trailer Number if any

	PO BOX 261075 DUBAI

	UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

ershipping.com <mailto:kiran@baxtershipping.com> >
	Subject: R: Drop ID# 176963 // 02/25/100484 / POLTRONA FRAU / AIR / ITALY - UAE - Patrick Chalhoub // RE: PILLOW CINEMA_Updated order by air | DAP

	 

	CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.
	تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

	Dear Geeta,

	There is a bit of confusion regarding this air cargo.

	The payment is DAP, which includes the air cargo, transportation from the airport to the Villa, assembly, and disposal of the packaging materials.
	What is your responsibility:

	*	customs duties and taxes.

	Therefore, the request from the local shipping agency is correct: the end client, who resides in Dubai, is responsible for paying the customs duties and taxes.

	Regarding the Poltrona Frau technician who will come to assemble the armchairs, I kindly ask for your assistance with the following:
	– Please confirm the address of the Villa
	– Suggest a few hotels with an economic fare near the Villa to help organize transportation in the morning and evening
	– Provide the contact name and phone number of the site manager, so that coordination for the arrival at the Villa can be arrange

	It is also important that one of your electricians is present during the installation to handle the electrical connections.

	 

	I would also like to ask if anyone from Studio Lissoni will be present during the installation.

	Shipment is booked with weekend arrival, please note we will not be accepting any storage charges on this shipment until the same is cleared & delivered.

	Kindly ensure the Gatepass is valid prior to scheduling the delivery and keep us updated on the status accordingly.

	Additionally, please clarify whether the installation and unpacking of the delivered items are within Baxter’s scope, or if this will need to be arranged separately.

	To proceed with the NOC application, kindly provide the following details at your earliest convenience:

	1.	Full name, Emirates ID number, and a clear copy of the Emirates ID for each individual who will be involved in the delivery.
	2.	Type of truck that will be used for transporting the items to the site.

	Subject: RE: Baxter Invoice 1872 - Drop ID# 176963 // 02/25/100484 / POLTRONA FRAU / AIR / ITALY - UAE - Patrick Chalhoub // RE: PILLOW CINEMA_Updated order by air | DAP

	 

	Hi @Kiran Anwar <mailto:kiran@baxtershipping.com> 

	 

	Please share the supporting ( BOE & VAT receipts ) for the invoice as discussed on 2nd July. 

	The attached invoice is not sufficient for payment @'Yasir Panthakkal' <mailto:yasir.panthakkal@etoilegroup.com>  – please confirm 

	 

	Kindly re-confirm attached are the personnel who will be arranging the delivery & Installation of the shipment at the site ?

	 

	Below as informed on my previous emails 

	//

	Hi @Kiran anwar <mailto:kiran@baxtershipping.com> 

	 

	Please ensure the Gatepass is arranged from your end. Should you require any assistance with the application process via the Nakheel website, feel free to reach out to @'Hiba Assaf' <mailto:hiba.assaf@etoilegroup.com>   or @Lali Das <mailto:Lali.Das@chalhoub.com> 

	Kindly ensure the Gatepass is valid prior to scheduling the delivery and keep us updated on the status accordingly.

	Additionally, please clarify whether the installation and unpacking of the delivered items are within Baxter’s scope, or if this will need to be arranged separately.

	To proceed with the NOC application, kindly provide the following details at your earliest convenience:

	1.	Full name, Emirates ID number, and a clear copy of the Emirates ID for each individual who will be involved in the delivery.
	2.	Type of truck that will be used for transporting the items to the site.

	Once we receive the above information, we will initiate the NOC process, after which the document will need to be uploaded to the Nakheel website for Gatepass approval.

	++ @Kiran anwar <mailto:kiran@baxtershipping.com>  / @Benson Davis <mailto:ben@baxtershipping.com> 

	 

	Dear All,

	Good Morning,

	 

	Noted, kindly share complete pre-alert and appreciate to coordinate on subject email chain for easy tracking & future reference.

	 

	Shipment is booked with weekend arrival, please note we will not be accepting any storage charges on this shipment until the same is cleared & delivered.

	As informed on a separate email, delivery is expected to take place on either 8th or 9th July.

	 

	Hi @Kiran anwar <mailto:kiran@baxtershipping.com> 

	 

	Please ensure the Gatepass is arranged from your end. Should you require any assistance with the application process via the Nakheel website, feel free to reach out to @'Hiba Assaf' <mailto:hiba.assaf@etoilegroup.com>   or @Lali Das <mailto:Lali.Das@chalhoub.com> 

	Kindly ensure the Gatepass is valid prior to scheduling the delivery and keep us updated on the status accordingly.

	Additionally, please clarify whether the installation and unpacking of the delivered items are within Baxter’s scope, or if this will need to be arranged separately.

	To proceed with the NOC application, kindly provide the following details at your earliest convenience:

	1.	Full name, Emirates ID number, and a clear copy of the Emirates ID for each individual who will be involved in the delivery.
	2.	Type of truck that will be used for transporting the items to the site.
